Html: Not sure if it was an omission for self development exercise but I was looking thru the bits ya'll put together for the phone and came across the stuff to replicate button events on the appbar.  It exists for the buttons but not menuitems.  Can register as an issue if you like, but I already went thru and coded up the menuitem events for app bar.

Hi Morgan,

You could post the implementation you've created here, so that other community users might benefit from using it. If you consider there should be an official version of this included in future Prism versions, you could create a work item in the Issue Tracker.

Thanks,

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi
